Phrase en Anglais: “Sanction” is a magic spell that we use to observe and assess mercenaries' actions.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Astral Candescence with beastmen.

Phrase en Anglais: Defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you will raise your Imperial Standing. Also, the stronger the monsters you fight, the higher your Imperial Standing will become.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Empire's current state of defense.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: When fighting in a beastman stronghold that has taken the Astral Candescence, your Imperial Standing will rise by a significant amount as thanks for your participation in the recovery effort.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “Sanction” is a magic spell that we use to observe and assess mercenaries' actions.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Sanction is also necessary in order to receive crystals from the enemies you defeat.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you will raise your Imperial Standing. Also, the stronger the monsters you fight, the higher your Imperial Standing will become.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But you must take caution. Stepping too far out of the Empire's boundaries will cause Sanction to wear off.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: When fighting in a beastman stronghold that has taken the Astral Candescence, your Imperial Standing will rise by a significant amount as thanks for your participation in the recovery effort.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can raise your Imperial Standing by defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Sanction is also necessary in order to receive crystals from the enemies you defeat.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Saving a captured prisoner in a beastman stronghold and submitting archaic mirrors to Imperial guards will also result in an increased Imperial Standing.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: But you must take caution. Stepping too far out of the Empire's boundaries will cause Sanction to wear off.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can view your Imperial Standing by selecting “Besieged” under “Region Info.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: You can raise your Imperial Standing by defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can also speak to me at any time to exchange your Imperial Standing credits for items.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Saving a captured prisoner in a beastman stronghold and submitting archaic mirrors to Imperial guards will also result in an increased Imperial Standing.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Besieged” occurs when the beastman armies breach the walls of Al Zahbi.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: You can view your Imperial Standing by selecting “Besieged” under “Region Info.”${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Everyone in town who is capable of wielding a weapon is called to action to defend Al Zahbi alongside the Imperial Army.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: You can also speak to me at any time to exchange your Imperial Standing credits for items.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The beastmen's main purpose is to enter the Hall of Binding and wrest the “Astral Candescence” from the Empire's control.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “Besieged” occurs when the beastman armies breach the walls of Al Zahbi.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You need not know what the Astral Candescence is.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Everyone in town who is capable of wielding a weapon is called to action to defend Al Zahbi alongside the Imperial Army.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: All you must know is that it is your duty to protect the five Serpent Generals who hold the keys to the Hall of Binding, and to drive the beastman hordes from the Imperial capital.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The beastmen's main purpose is to enter the Hall of Binding and wrest the “Astral Candescence” from the Empire's control.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The Empire's safety and its future rest on your capable shoulders!
Phrase en Français: You need not know what the Astral Candescence is.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Rest assured that you will be rewarded for your efforts.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: All you must know is that it is your duty to protect the five Serpent Generals who hold the keys to the Hall of Binding, and to drive the beastman hordes from the Imperial capital.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The Empire's defense is entrusted to five generals.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The Empire's safety and its future rest on your capable shoulders!

Phrase en Anglais: Each possesses a name corresponding to the symbols of the Empire--the serpents of flame, water, stone, gales, and sky.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Rest assured that you will be rewarded for your efforts.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Furthermore, the mirrors used to open the Hall of Binding are divided among their possession. Thus, the generals' fates determine the tide of battle.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The Empire's defense is entrusted to five generals.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If all five generals should fall in battle, the Hall of Binding will open, and the beastmen will be able to seize the Astral Candescence.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Each possesses a name corresponding to the symbols of the Empire--the serpents of flame, water, stone, gales, and sky.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: It is your responsibility to prevent such a disaster from happening. We are depending on you!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Furthermore, the mirrors used to open the Hall of Binding are divided among their possession. Thus, the generals' fates determine the tide of battle.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: When the Astral Candescence is safely resting on its plinth in the Hall of Binding, it emanates waves that bestow special bonuses to Sanction.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: If all five generals should fall in battle, the Hall of Binding will open, and the beastmen will be able to seize the Astral Candescence.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The first bonus is a slight boost to the amount of experience points received from battles. You will receive this effect simply by having Sanction cast on you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: It is your responsibility to prevent such a disaster from happening. We are depending on you!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There are several other bonus effects, but you must sacrifice some of your Imperial Standing credits in order to receive them.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: When the Astral Candescence is safely resting on its plinth in the Hall of Binding, it emanates waves that bestow special bonuses to Sanction.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Keep in mind that the bonuses become more powerful with the number of times the Imperial capital is successfully defended.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The first bonus is a slight boost to the amount of experience points received from battles. You will receive this effect simply by having Sanction cast on you.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Sanction's strength will reset if the beastmen succeed in invading the Hall of Binding, though.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: There are several other bonus effects, but you must sacrifice some of your Imperial Standing credits in order to receive them.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The waves emanating from the Astral Candescence in Al Zahbi bring a multitude of blessings to all of us. You must not let it fall into the hands of the beastmen!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Keep in mind that the bonuses become more powerful with the number of times the Imperial capital is successfully defended.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If the beastmen manage to take the Astral Candescence, its recovery will become our top priority. Find the coveted item on a plinth in one of the beastman strongholds and seize it back for the Empire!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Sanction's strength will reset if the beastmen succeed in invading the Hall of Binding, though.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called “Voidwalkers.” Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Alignment.

Phrase en Anglais: Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.
Phrase en Français: Atmacite.

Phrase en Anglais: This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Periapt.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed “Voidwatch Operations,” or “Ops” for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called “Voidwalkers.” Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time “Voidwatcher” status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.

Phrase en Anglais: Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.
Phrase en Français: Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed “Voidwatch Operations,” or “Ops” for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time “Voidwatcher” status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.

Phrase en Anglais: However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.
Phrase en Français: Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The “voidstone” is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.

Phrase en Anglais: Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.
Phrase en Français: These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The “voidstone” is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.

Phrase en Anglais: Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as “ascent items.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as “ascent items.”${prompt}
